techcrunch.title: Facebook Patents Clever Way To Advertise Just To Important People

techcrunch.title: Elemental Path Debuts The First Toys Powered By IBM Watson
techcrunch.topComment: In Isaac Asimov's Foundation series, there are some scenes where a boy is raised by an omnipresent artifical intelligence help guide his learning as he grows up.
